title: A site user.
description: An individual site user, which can be referenced by other objects (for example, posts) as being the author/owner of that object.

version.description: The schema version that this user object adheres to.

id.description: The user ID. It must be a positive integer.

login.description: The login or username for this user.

name.description:
A display name for the user.
When set as an object, it can be split up into the first name, last name, and preferred display name.
When set as a string, that string will be treated as the display name.
